rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “At the beginning of each end step, put -1/-1 counter on this creature.” and retreat 2 {6} [i](Exile this permanent face-down. Distribute up to two +1/+1 counters among up to two target creatures you control.)[/i]
When Instill Plague is put into a graveyard, draw two cards.
